channel.title: PokeNation 2012 - A new Pokemon MORPG
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/etsltz.jpg[/img] [/center]
[right][img]http://i.imgur.com/QBunW.png[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W3VQULl1vK8[/youtube]
[b]PokeNation [/b]is a project that started back in 2010, since the beginning that what we want to create is a new Pokemon Online Game, but not just another one! We want you to enjoy the real Pokemon gameplay while being able to fully interact with your friends, building an healthy competition. PokeNation is being programmed in Java, and since the engine isn't completely done we can't show real content at this moment. [/right]
[left][img]http://i.imgur.com/ryDKD.png[/img]
[b]Engine Programmer: [/b][i]Xavier[/i] [b]Content Developer:[/b] [i]Mika[/i] [b]Website Manager:[/b] [i]Luis[/i] [/left]
[right][img]http://i.imgur.com/NshfC.png[/img]
[i][b]Most is not done yet as we are mainly working on the engine itself. Also, this list will be modified as we think on new things to add.[/b][/i]
[size=2][b]Game Content[/b][/size]
HGSS Sounds HGSS Sprites HGSS Pokemon D/P/T Tilesets Kanto Region(look-a-like) Johto Region(look-a-like)
[size=2][b]Engine Features[/b][/size]
Battle System Battle Camera Movements Chat System Interface System Sound System NPC System Multi Cursors In-game Custom Outfit System Gender selection Map loading and rendering Cache System Multiplayer character updating Arrow Key/Mouse Walking System Auto cache/client updater Multi characters per account Account Registration
[size=2][b]Website Features[/b][/size]
(Website hasn't been started at all as we are still discussing what it will have and won't have)
[/right]
[left][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a0fCY.png[/img]
05.03.12: Started programming chat box, worked on main interface concept. 01.03.12: Created project threads in various forums.
[/left]
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9swsC.png[/img] [B] Login Screen (Will be modified soon) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KbamE.png[/img]
Ingame Simple Screen [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EUSU1.png[/img]
Main Interface (it's only a concept based on PWO) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XCKZz.png[/img]
Main Interface little update+Start of chat box [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2Ksvr.png[/img]
Walking/Map loading/Female char (kinda laggy while recording) [IMG]http://www.pokenation.org/images/walking.gif[/img]
[/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8Tvkt.png[/img]
[B]Original content[/B] - Nintendo/Creatures Inc. and GAME FREAK Inc. [B]ROM editing tools[/B] - Everyone who share their ROM editing tools [B]Map Editor/Tool[/B] - [URL=http://"http://www.mapeditor.org/"]Tiled[/URL]
[b][i] Thanks for following the project and for supporting us! [/i][/b][/center]

item.title: PokeNation 2012 - A new Pokemon MORPG
item.dc:creator: @PokeNation PokeNation
item.description:
@PokeNation wrote:

[center]

[/center]

[right]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W3VQULl1vK8[/youtube]

PokeNation is a project that started back in 2010, since the beginning that
what we want to create is a new Pokemon Online Game, but not just another one!
We want you to enjoy the real Pokemon gameplay while being able to fully interact
with your friends, building an healthy competition.
PokeNation is being programmed in Java, and since the engine isn’t
completely done we can’t show real content at this moment.
[/right]

[left]

Engine Programmer: Xavier
Content Developer: Mika
Website Manager: Luis
[/left]

[right]

Most is not done yet as we are mainly working on the engine itself.
Also, this list will be modified as we think on new things to add.

[size=2]Game Content[/size]

HGSS Sounds
HGSS Sprites
HGSS Pokemon
D/P/T Tilesets
Kanto Region(look-a-like)
Johto Region(look-a-like)

[size=2]Engine Features[/size]

Battle System
Battle Camera Movements
Chat System
Interface System
Sound System
NPC System
Multi Cursors In-game
Custom Outfit System
Gender selection
Map loading and rendering
Cache System
Multiplayer character updating
Arrow Key/Mouse Walking System
Auto cache/client updater
Multi characters per account
Account Registration

[size=2]Website Features[/size]

(Website hasn’t been started at all as we are still
discussing what it will have and won’t have)

[/right]

[left]

05.03.12: Started programming chat box, worked on main interface concept.
01.03.12: Created project threads in various forums.

[/left]

[center]
[B]
Login Screen (Will be modified soon)

KbamE.png816×638

Ingame Simple Screen

EUSU1.png817×634

Main Interface (it’s only a concept based on PWO)

XCKZz.png806×606

Main Interface little update+Start of chat box

2Ksvr.png817×640

Walking/Map loading/Female char (kinda laggy while recording)

[/B]

Original content - Nintendo/Creatures Inc. and GAME FREAK Inc.
ROM editing tools - Everyone who share their ROM editing tools
Map Editor/Tool - Tiled


Thanks for following the project and for supporting us!
[/center]
